name: Wall Magazine
text: Showcase your creativity through our wall magazine competition. Design informative and artistic displays that highlight important engineering concepts and innovations.

name: Project Display
text: Present your innovative projects to peers and judges. This segment allows you to demonstrate practical applications of your knowledge and problem-solving skills.

name: Olympiad
text: Test your theoretical knowledge and technical skills in our comprehensive Olympiad. Compete with the brightest minds in various engineering disciplines.
